page.syntax: OutputString as C = Fetch_State_List_Get(N records[,N step])

argument.name: records
argument.description: The number of records to examine.

argument.name: step
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The interval between records.

page.description: Returns list of fetch states from head or tail of an ASX file (direction depends on +/- records).
page.discussion: The .FETCH_STATE_LIST_GET() method returns a list of fetch states from head or tail of an ASX file (direction depends on +/- records).
